data.title: Huntington, WV Funeral Home & Cremation
data.meta_description: Reger Funeral Home & Cremation Services in Huntington, WV provides funeral, memorial, aftercare, pre-planning, and cremation servi... Learn More
data.text:
Reger Funeral Home

Celebrates 100 Years of Service

Reger Funeral Home is proud to announce the celebration of our centennial anniversary. Since 1924 you have entrusted Reger Funeral Home to care for your loved ones for over 5 generations. We are proud to be a family owned and operated business operating within the Huntington and Tri-State Communities.

We would like to extend a heartfelt thank you to all the familes that have entrusted Reger Funeral Home with the care of your loved ones over the past 100 years. Without your support we wouldn't be able to celebrate 100 years of service to our coommunity.

We would like to thank all of the employees who have worked for Reger Funeral Home over the past 100 years. Without your dedication to the funeral home and the families we serve this celebration wouldn't be possible.

In celebration of the centennial we have set up a small display of our history in the front hall of the funeral home. We encourage you to stop in and visit the display to share in our history.

We will also be announcing several community events to celebrate the centennial. Please visit the 100 year page in the WHO WE ARE section of our website to learn more as the details become available.

The Reger Family would like to thank anyone who has ever trusted us with the care of a loved one, and to every visitor that has passed through our doors to visit a dear friend, and to every spouse, parent, child, sibling or relative that has sat down opposite on of our funeral directors in the past 100 years.

THANK YOU!

- The Reger Family

Welcome to

Reger Funeral Home & Cremation Services in Huntington, WV

AND

Reger Funeral Home & Crematory Ceredo-Kenova Chapel in Ceredo, WV

When you have experienced the loss of a loved one, you can trust Reger Funeral Services to guide you through the process of honoring their life. At Reger Funeral Home & Cremation Services, we take pride in our 98 year history of serving families in Huntington, Ceredo, and the surrounding areas with dignity, respect, and compassion. We offer an on-site crematory conveniently located at our Ceredo-Kenova Chapel and wonderful facilities for visitation, memorial or funeral services at both the Huntington and Ceredo-Kenova Chapels. Our staff is experienced in a variety of funeral services and can help you celebrate your loved one no matter your religion, culture, or budget.

Please stop in or call to ask about preneed at either location today.

A message from Reger Funeral Home about COVID-19:

Reger Funeral Home remains committed to continuing the high level of service that our community has come to expect from our staff. While new challenges have been presented by Covid-19, Reger Funeral Home is here to guide your family through the process of honoring the lives of your loved ones. Both our Huntington and Ceredo-Kenova locations will continue to provide your family with compassion and dignity. We continue to hold public visitations, funerals, memorial services, and graveside services. Please see our Covid-19 page in the resources section of our website for more information on local and state guidelines as well as how we are working to keep you and your families safe.

- Patrick, George, Andrew Reger and the Staff of Reger Funeral Home
